trans-unit.source: Represents the information needed by an event handler to perform custom processing whenever the contents of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref> changes.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
The index of the change within the subject <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>.

A strongly typed <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

A strongly typed <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each added <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> which originated the event.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> corresponding to the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
The index of the change within the subject <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> which was removed from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> which was added to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> which originated the event.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> corresponding to the event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> representing the type of change that occurred.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> representing the type of change that occurred.

Gets a strongly typed <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each added <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

A strongly typed <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each added <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Gets the index of the change originating the event.
The index of the change originating the event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> which originated the event.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> which originated the event.

Gets a strongly typed <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

A strongly typed <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
